message.validShuweiLicense: 您当前的数维平台版本已经过期。您可能需要考虑升级到最新版本.
message.invalidShuweiLicense:
No active Shuwei subscription found.
Automatic updates cannot be performed.
You may want to purchase a Shuwei subscription via the Shuwei account page.

actions.deactivateNone: I am aware of the implicit dangers and still want to update Shuwei without deactivating incompatible extensions first. I am conscious, that Shuwei cannot guarantee the functionality of my installation after an incompatible update.

plugins.pluginNotInStore: This extension is not available in the store. Please contact the extension's authors.
plugins.pluginWillBeDeactivatedHint: (This extension will be deactivated on update)

updateModal.messageIncompatible: Some of the extensions installed are not compatible with the latest Shuwei version. If you continue updating now, unknown issues could occur and gravely harm your system. Shuwei is able to automatically deactivate incompatible extensions during the update process in order to ensures the continued functionality of your installation. After updating these extensions accordingly, you will have the possibility to re-activate them manually.
updateModal.messageNotInStore: There are extensions installed that could not successfully be tested for compatibility. Please contact the extension's authors for more information. In this case it is strongly recommended to create a backup before updating.
updateModal.messageOkay: All prerequisites fulfilled. Don't forget to create a backup before updating.
updateModal.messageUpdateCheck: Your current version can be updated to {version}. What do you want to do?
